entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
